getBalance().details: gets the balance of the contract

getState().details: The current state of the contract in the lifecycle
getState().return: state, the state of the transaction

getTransactionDetails().return: _name, name of transaction_desc,  description of transaction_value, value of transaction_coverage, current coverage_maxCoverage, maximum set coverage_premium_percent, premium perecent_counterParty, counterparty of the transaction_insurer, insurer address_status, the state of the contract_owner, owner of this contract_balance, balance of contract

insure().details: insures the transaction locking up to the maximum coverage

settle().details: Begins a flow to settle the state of the escrow transaction, transfering the value ---- of contract to the counter party, and if insured transfers the exisiting coverage ---- and settlement fee is transfered to the insurer.
settle().return: _success, successfully insured the contract or not

transferInsurer(address).details: allows the currently insurer to transfer their rights to a new insurer

params.newOwner: new insurer who is entitle to insurance settlment
